author: Tuzi
title: An ugly little set.
review:
Disclaimer: I hate clowns.

I got this set for free on two occasions at the Play Today LEGO Shop in Gouda, The Netherlands.

Overall it's a decent enough selection of parts and building the set is fun too. The techniques used are smart, and the final model has no problem standing straight no matter how I pose it. Very stable!

But it is hideous. The face has a menacing expression that just ruins most of the set, and the stubs for arms aren't helping much either. I would never buy this set myself and it really isn't worth the RRP of 5 bucks.

Mere moments after I finished building one, I immediately parted it out. Didn't even bother with the second one.

Unless you're really into clowns, there's no reason to get this set.
